name: Adults who reported that a computer or other digital device and the Internet were always available for children to use at home for educational purposes, by selected adult characteristics: 7−12 May 2020 and 16−28 September 2020
description: Adults who reported that a computer or other digital device and the Internet were always available for children to use at home for educational purposes, by selected adult characteristics: 7−12 May 2020 and 16−28 September 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_7_12_may_2020_computer_or_other_digital_device
variableMeasured.description: 7 12 May 2020 Computer Or Other Digital Device

variableMeasured.name: field_16_28_september_2020_computer_or_other_digital_device

notes: Adults in households with only homeschooled children are not included. Percentages may not add to 100% because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, special tabulations (2020) of the 2020 U.S. Census Bureau Household Pulse Survey. Science and Engineering Indicators
